File: vsip/matrix.hpp
  1/* Copyright (c) 2005 by CodeSourcery, LLC.  All rights reserved. */
  2
  3/** @file    matrix.hpp
  4    @author  Zack Weinberg
  5    @date    2005-03-22
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: [view.matrix] views implementing
  7             two-dimensional matrices.
  8
  9    This file declares the \c const_Matrix and \c Matrix classes,
 10    which provide the generic View interface, and implement the
 11    mathematical idea of matrices, i.e. two-dimensional storage and
 12    access to values.  A \c const_Matrix view is not modifiable, but a
 13    \c Matrix view is modifiable.  */
 14
 15#ifndef VSIP_MATRIX_HPP
 16#define VSIP_MATRIX_HPP
 17
 18/***********************************************************************
 19  Included Files
 20***********************************************************************/
 21

 23#include <vsip/domain.hpp>
 24#include <vsip/dense.hpp>
 25#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
 26#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 27#include <vsip/core/block_fill.hpp>
 28#include <vsip/core/subblock.hpp>
 29#include <vsip/core/refcount.hpp>
 30#include <vsip/core/view_traits.hpp>
 31#include <vsip/core/assign.hpp>
 32#include <vsip/core/lvalue_proxy.hpp>
 33#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>
 34#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 35# include <vsip_csl/pi/iterator.hpp>
 36#endif

 39  Declarations
 40***********************************************************************/

 42namespace vsip
 43{
 44
 45/// View which appears as a two-dimensional, read-only matrix.
 46template <typename T, typename Block>
 47class const_Matrix : public impl::Non_assignable,
 48		     public  vsip::impl_const_View<vsip::const_Matrix,Block>
 49{
 50  typedef vsip::impl_const_View<vsip::const_Matrix,Block> impl_base_type;
 51  typedef typename impl::Lvalue_factory_type<Block>::type impl_factory_type;
 52
 53public:
 54  // Compile-time values.
 55  static const dimension_type dim = 2;
 56  typedef Block                                      block_type;
 57  typedef typename block_type::value_type            value_type;
 58  typedef typename impl_factory_type::reference_type reference_type;
 59  typedef typename impl_factory_type::const_reference_type
 60		const_reference_type;
 61  typedef typename impl_base_type::impl_const_view_type impl_const_view_type;
 62
 63  // [view.matrix.subview_types]
 64protected:
 65  typedef typename block_type::map_type impl_map_type;
 66  typedef impl::Subset_block<block_type> impl_subblock_type;
 67  typedef impl::Transposed_block<block_type> impl_transblock_type;
 68  typedef impl::Sliced_block<block_type, 1> impl_coblock_type;
 69  typedef impl::Sliced_block<block_type, 0> impl_roblock_type;
 70  typedef impl::Diag_block<block_type> impl_diagblock_type;
 71
 72public:
 73  typedef const_Matrix<T, impl_subblock_type> subview_type;
 74  typedef const_Matrix<T, impl_subblock_type> const_subview_type;
 75  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_coblock_type> col_type;
 76  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_coblock_type> const_col_type;
 77  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_diagblock_type> diag_type;
 78  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_diagblock_type> const_diag_type;
 79  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_roblock_type> row_type;
 80  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_roblock_type> const_row_type;
 81  typedef const_Matrix<T, impl_transblock_type> transpose_type;
 82  typedef const_Matrix<T, impl_transblock_type> const_transpose_type;
 83
 84  // [view.matrix.constructors]
 85  const_Matrix(length_type num_rows, length_type num_cols, T const& value,
 86	       impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
 87    : impl_base_type(new block_type(Domain<2>(num_rows, num_cols), value, map),
 88	   impl::noincrement)
 89  {}
 90  const_Matrix(length_type num_rows, length_type num_cols,
 91	       impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
 92    : impl_base_type(new block_type(Domain<2>(num_rows, num_cols), map),
 93	   impl::noincrement)
 94  {}
 95  const_Matrix(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW
 96    : impl_base_type(&blk)
 97  {}
 98  const_Matrix(const_Matrix const& m) VSIP_NOTHROW
 99    : impl_base_type(&m.block())
100  {}
101  ~const_Matrix() VSIP_NOTHROW
102  {}
103
104  // [view.matrix.valaccess]
105  value_type get(vsip::index_type r, vsip::index_type c) const VSIP_NOTHROW
106  {
107    assert(r < this->size(0));
108    assert(c < this->size(1));
109    return this->block().get(r, c);
110  }
111
112  // Supported for some, but not all, underlying Blocks.
113  const_reference_type operator()(vsip::index_type r, vsip::index_type c)
114    const VSIP_NOTHROW
115  {
116    assert(r < this->size(0));
117    assert(c < this->size(1));
118    impl_factory_type f(this->block());
119    return f.impl_ref(r, c);
120  }
121
122  // [view.matrix.subviews]
123  const_subview_type get(const Domain<2>& dom)
124    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
125  {
126    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
127    return const_subview_type(block);
128  }
129
130  const_subview_type operator()(const Domain<2>& dom)
131    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
132  {
133    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
134    return const_subview_type(block);
135  }
136
137  const_transpose_type transpose() const
138    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
139  {
140    impl_transblock_type block(this->block());
141    return const_transpose_type(block);
142  }
143
144  // [view.matrix.accessors]
145
146  const_col_type col(vsip::index_type i) const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
147  {
148    assert(i < this->size(1));
149    impl_coblock_type block(this->block(), i);
150    return const_col_type(block);
151  }
152  const_row_type row(vsip::index_type i) const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
153  {
154    assert(i < this->size(0));
155    impl_roblock_type block(this->block(), i);
156    return const_row_type(block);
157  }
158  const_diag_type diag(index_difference_type diagonal_offset = 0)
159    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
160  {
161    impl_diagblock_type block(this->block(), diagonal_offset);
162    return const_diag_type(block);
163  }
164#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
165  template <typename I, typename J>
166  typename impl::enable_if_c<vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<I>::value || 
167			     vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<J>::value,
168			     vsip_csl::pi::Call<block_type, I, J> >::type
169  operator()(I const &i, J const &j)
170  {
171    using namespace vsip_csl::pi;
172    return Call<block_type, I, J>(this->block(), i, j);
173  }
174#endif
175};
176
177/// View which appears as a two-dimensional, modifiable matrix.  This
178/// inherits from const_Matrix, so only the members that const_Matrix
179/// does not carry, or that are different, need be specified.
180template <typename T, typename Block>
181class Matrix : public vsip::impl_View<vsip::Matrix,Block>
182{
183  typedef vsip::impl_View<vsip::Matrix,Block> impl_base_type;
184  typedef typename impl::Lvalue_factory_type<Block>::type impl_factory_type;
185
186public:
187  // Compile-time values.
188  static const dimension_type dim = 2;
189  typedef Block                                     block_type;
190  typedef typename block_type::value_type           value_type;
191  typedef typename impl_factory_type::reference_type reference_type;
192  typedef typename impl_factory_type::const_reference_type
193		const_reference_type;
194
195  // [view.matrix.subview_types]
196protected:
197  typedef typename block_type::map_type impl_map_type;
198  typedef impl::Subset_block<block_type> impl_subblock_type;
199  typedef impl::Transposed_block<block_type> impl_transblock_type;  
200  typedef impl::Sliced_block<Block, 1> impl_coblock_type;
201  typedef impl::Sliced_block<Block, 0> impl_roblock_type;
202  typedef impl::Diag_block<Block> impl_diagblock_type;
203
204public:
205  typedef       Matrix<T, impl_subblock_type> subview_type;
206  typedef const_Matrix<T, impl_subblock_type> const_subview_type;
207  typedef       Vector<T, impl_coblock_type> col_type;
208  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_coblock_type> const_col_type;
209  typedef       Vector<T, impl_diagblock_type> diag_type;
210  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_diagblock_type> const_diag_type;
211  typedef       Vector<T, impl_roblock_type> row_type;
212  typedef const_Vector<T, impl_roblock_type> const_row_type;
213  typedef       Matrix<T, impl_transblock_type> transpose_type;
214  typedef const_Matrix<T, impl_transblock_type> const_transpose_type;
215
216  // [view.matrix.constructors]
217  Matrix(length_type num_rows, length_type num_cols, const T& value,
218	 impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
219    : impl_base_type(num_rows, num_cols, value, map, impl::disambiguate)
220  {}
221  Matrix(length_type num_rows, length_type num_cols,
222	 impl_map_type const& map = impl_map_type())
223    : impl_base_type(num_rows, num_cols, map)
224  {}
225  Matrix(Block& blk) VSIP_NOTHROW : impl_base_type(blk) {}
226  Matrix(Matrix const& v) VSIP_NOTHROW : impl_base_type(v.block()) 
227  { impl::expr::evaluate(this->block());}
228  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
229  Matrix(const_Matrix<T0,Block0> const& m)
230    : impl_base_type(m.size(0), m.size(1), m.block().map()) { *this = m;}
231  ~Matrix()VSIP_NOTHROW {}
232
233  // [view.matrix.valaccess]
234  void put(vsip::index_type r, vsip::index_type c, value_type val) const VSIP_NOTHROW
235  {
236    assert(r < this->size(0));
237    assert(c < this->size(1));
238    this->block().put(r, c, val);
239  }
240
241  reference_type operator()(vsip::index_type r, vsip::index_type c)
242    VSIP_NOTHROW
243  {
244    assert(r < this->size(0));
245    assert(c < this->size(1));
246    impl_factory_type f(this->block());
247    return f.impl_ref(r, c);
248  }
249  
250#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
251  template <typename I, typename J>
252  typename impl::enable_if_c<vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<I>::value || 
253			     vsip_csl::pi::is_iterator<J>::value,
254			     vsip_csl::pi::Call<block_type, I, J> >::type
255  operator()(I const &i, J const &j)
256  {
257    using namespace vsip_csl::pi;
258    return Call<block_type, I, J>(this->block(), i, j);
259  }
260#endif
261
262  Matrix& operator=(Matrix const& m) VSIP_NOTHROW
263  {
264    assert(this->size(0) == m.size(0) && this->size(1) == m.size(1));
265    impl::assign<2>(this->block(), m.block());
266    return *this;
267  }
268
269  Matrix& operator=(const_reference_type val) VSIP_NOTHROW
270  {
271    impl::expr::Scalar<2, T> scalar(val);
272    impl::assign<2>(this->block(), scalar);
273    return *this;
274  }
275  template <typename T0>
276  Matrix& operator=(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW
277  {
278    impl::expr::Scalar<2, T0> scalar(val);
279    impl::assign<2>(this->block(), scalar);
280    return *this;
281  }
282  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
283  Matrix& operator=(const_Matrix<T0, Block0> const& m) VSIP_NOTHROW
284  {
285    assert(this->size(0) == m.size(0) && this->size(1) == m.size(1));
286    impl::assign<2>(this->block(), m.block());
287    return *this;
288  }
289  template <typename T0, typename Block0>
290  Matrix& operator=(Matrix<T0, Block0> const& m) VSIP_NOTHROW
291  {
292    assert(this->size(0) == m.size(0) && this->size(1) == m.size(1));
293    impl::assign<2>(this->block(), m.block());
294    return *this;
295  }
296
297  // [view.matrix.subviews]
298  subview_type
299  operator()(const Domain<2>& dom) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
300  {
301    impl_subblock_type block(dom, this->block());
302    return subview_type(block);
303  }
304
305  transpose_type
306  transpose() const
307    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
308  {
309    impl_transblock_type block(this->block());
310    return transpose_type(block);
311  }
312
313  const_col_type col(vsip::index_type i) const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
314  { return impl_base_type::col(i); } 
315  col_type col(vsip::index_type i) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
316  {
317    assert(i < this->size(1));
318    impl_coblock_type block(this->block(), i);
319    return col_type(block);
320  }
321
322  const_row_type row(vsip::index_type i) const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
323  { return impl_base_type::row(i); } 
324  row_type row(vsip::index_type i) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
325  {
326    assert(i < this->size(0));
327    impl_roblock_type block(this->block(), i);
328    return row_type(block);
329  }
330
331  const_diag_type diag(index_difference_type diagonal_offset = 0)
332    const VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
333  { return impl_base_type::diag(diagonal_offset); }
334  diag_type diag(index_difference_type diagonal_offset = 0)
335    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
336  {
337    impl_diagblock_type block(this->block(), diagonal_offset);
338    return diag_type(block);
339  }
340
341#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR(op)        			\
342  *this = *this op val
343
344#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR_NOFWD(op)				\
345  for (vsip::index_type r = 0; r < this->size(0); ++r)			\
346    for (vsip::index_type c = 0; c < this->size(1); ++c)		\
347      this->put(r, c, this->get(r, c) op val)
348
349#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX(op)				\
350  *this = *this op m;
351
352#define VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX_NOFWD(op)				\
353  assert(this->size(0) == m.size(0) && this->size(1) == m.size(1));	\
354  for (vsip::index_type r = 0; r < this->size(0); ++r)			\
355    for (vsip::index_type c = 0; c < this->size(1); ++c)		\
356      this->put(r, c, this->get(r, c) op m.get(r, c))
357  
358#define VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(asop, op)			   	   \
359  template <typename T0>                                           \
360  Matrix& operator asop(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW                \
361  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR(op); return *this;}               \
362  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
363  Matrix& operator asop(const_Matrix<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
364  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX(op); return *this;}               \
365  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
366  Matrix& operator asop(const Matrix<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
367  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX(op); return *this;}
368
369#define VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP_NOFWD(asop, op)			   	   \
370  template <typename T0>                                           \
371  Matrix& operator asop(T0 const& val) VSIP_NOTHROW                \
372  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR_NOFWD(op); return *this;}               \
373  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
374  Matrix& operator asop(const_Matrix<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
375  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX_NOFWD(op); return *this;}               \
376  template <typename T0, typename Block0>                          \
377  Matrix& operator asop(const Matrix<T0, Block0> m) VSIP_NOTHROW   \
378  { VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX_NOFWD(op); return *this;}
379
380  // [view.matrix.assign]
381  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(+=, +)
382  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(-=, -)
383  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(*=, *)
384  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP(/=, /)
385  // For vector, ghs claims the use of operator& in 'view1 & view2' is
386  // ambiguous, thus we implement operator&= in terms of the scalar
387  // operator&.  Likewise for operator=| and operator=^.
388  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP_NOFWD(&=, &)
389  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP_NOFWD(|=, |)
390  VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP_NOFWD(^=, ^)
391};
392
393
394#undef VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP
395#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR
396#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX
397#undef VSIP_IMPL_ASSIGN_OP_NOFWD
398#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_SCALAR_NOFWD
399#undef VSIP_IMPL_ELEMENTWISE_MATRIX_NOFWD
400
401// [view.matrix.convert]
402template <typename T, typename Block>
403struct ViewConversion<Matrix, T, Block>
404{
405  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> const_view_type;
406  typedef Matrix<T, Block>       view_type;
407};
408
409template <typename T, typename Block>
410struct ViewConversion<const_Matrix, T, Block>
411{
412  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> const_view_type;
413  typedef Matrix<T, Block>       view_type;
414};
415
416namespace impl
417{
418
419template <typename T,
420	  typename Block>
421struct View_of_dim<2, T, Block>
422{
423  typedef Matrix<T, Block>       type;
424  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> const_type;
425};
426
427template <typename T, typename Block>
428struct Is_view_type<Matrix<T, Block> >
429{
430  typedef Matrix<T, Block> type; 
431  static bool const value = true;
432};
433
434template <typename T, typename Block> 
435struct Is_view_type<const_Matrix<T, Block> >
436{
437  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> type; 
438  static bool const value = true;
439};
440
441template <typename T, typename Block> 
442struct Is_const_view_type<const_Matrix<T, Block> >
443{
444  typedef const_Matrix<T, Block> type; 
445  static bool const value = true;
446};
447
448template <typename T, typename Block>
449T
450get(const_Matrix<T, Block> view, Index<2> const &i)
451{
452  return view.get(i[0], i[1]);
453}
454
455template <typename T, typename Block>
456void
457put(Matrix<T, Block> view, Index<2> const &i, T value)
458{
459  view.put(i[0], i[1], value);
460}
461
462/// Return the view extent as a domain.
463template <typename T,
464	  typename Block>
465inline Domain<2>
466view_domain(const_Matrix<T, Block> const& view)
467{
468  return Domain<2>(view.size(0), view.size(1));
469}
470
471/// Get the extent of a matrix view, as a Length.
472template <typename T,
473	  typename Block>
474inline Length<2>
475extent(const_Matrix<T, Block> const &v)
476{
477  return Length<2>(v.size(0), v.size(1));
478}

480} // namespace vsip::impl
